General.Name: Lily Group Co Ltd
General.Description: Lily Group Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells organic pigments in the People's Republic of China. It offers pigment for inks, paint, pearlescent, and plastics; and paint and plastic color cards. The company was founded in 1989 and is based in Hangzhou, the People's Republic of China. Lily Group Co., Ltd. operates as a subsidiary of Lily Holding Co., Ltd.
